title: HOUR 3- Ron Rivera Sep 15, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Ron Rivera Sep 15, 2020
description:
Washington Football Team Head Coach Ron Rivera tells Dan that he caught his cancer early and in time to treat. Coach says he had already planned to do an IV at the half of Sundays game prior to the game to stay hydrated. Coach Ron says that yes he does follow Cam's success and says that Cam seems happy and that is all that matters.

content:encoded:
Washington Football Team Head Coach Ron Rivera tells Dan that he caught his cancer early and in time to treat. Coach says he had already planned to do an IV at the half of Sundays game prior to the game to stay hydrated. Coach Ron says that yes he does follow Cam's success and says that Cam seems happy and that is all that matters.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
